mapper.sql: id, uuid, emaill, name, pwd, is_del, create_time, last_modify_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, uuid, emaill, name, pwd, is_del, create_time, last_modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emaill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_user
id,
uuid,
emaill,
name,
pwd,
is_del,
create_time,
last_modify_time,

mapper.update:
update t_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where emaill = #{emaill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_user set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emaill = #{emaill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
